attributes.action: wholeheartedly apologise for the disgravceful behavoir of his key advisor, McBride on smear tactics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown is forever carping on about his moral compass and his sense of duty. If Mr Brown has any sense of morality and common decency, he will openly and unreservedly apologise for endorsing such tactics within his government perpetrated by his number 1 advisor Mr McBride. Mr Brown cannot continually deny knowledge of deeds that are clearly wrong whilst on his watch. Just how much more of such disgraceful behavoir lurks within No 10, Mr Brown and his cohorts.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
